Posted By: CrossroadsDemon (10/23/2009 5:16:05 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The original black [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God) the flavor for this is so much better than [Damnation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Damnation). Call back to [Phyrexian Purge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Purge ) except you don't get to decide what dies.
  
   
Even if it's less practical, flavor wise it's infinitely better than the Wrath carbon copy.
posts.html:
The original black Wrath of God the flavor for this is so much better than Damnation. Call back to Phyrexian Purge except you don't get to decide what dies.

Even if it's less practical, flavor wise it's infinitely better than the Wrath carbon copy.
